statements: SELECT * FROM films WHERE director = 'Steven Spielberg';
SELECT title, director FROM films WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, release_date FROM films ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT director, COUNT(*) FROM films GROUP BY director;
SELECT DISTINCT director FROM films;
SELECT * FROM films WHERE director='Christopher Nolan';
SELECT film_id, title FROM films WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT title, release_date FROM films WHERE director='Quentin Tarantino' AND release_date < '2010-01-01';
SELECT director, COUNT(*) FROM films GROUP BY director HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM films WHERE director='Martin Scorsese' OR director='Steven Spielberg' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM films;
SELECT title, director FROM films WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT director, title FROM films WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan';
SELECT release_date, director, title FROM films WHERE release_date < '2021-01-01' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT director_name FROM film_directors WHERE director_id > 10;
SELECT title, director FROM films WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM films WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan' AND release_date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2019-12-31';
SELECT director_name, COUNT(film_id) AS film_count FROM film_directors JOIN films ON film_directors.director_id = films.film_id GROUP BY director_name ORDER BY film_count DESC;
SELECT title, director, release_date FROM films WHERE director = 'Quentin Tarantino' OR director = 'Steven Spielberg' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT director, AVG(YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(release_date)) AS avg_years_since_release FROM films GROUP BY director HAVING avg_years_since_release > 5 ORDER BY avg_years_since_release DESC;
SELECT * FROM film_directors;
SELECT id, director_name FROM film_directors ORDER BY director_name DESC;
SELECT film_title FROM films WHERE director_id = 1;
SELECT film_title, director_name FROM films JOIN film_directors ON films.director_id = film_directors.id;
SELECT director_name, COUNT(film_id) AS film_count FROM director_index JOIN film_directors ON director_index.director_id = film_directors.id GROUP BY director_name HAVING film_count > 1;
SELECT director_name, film_title FROM film_directors JOIN films ON film_directors.id = films.director_id
SELECT film_title, director_name FROM films JOIN film_directors ON films.director_id = film_directors.id
SELECT film_title FROM films WHERE director_id IN (SELECT director_id FROM director_index)
SELECT director_name, film_title FROM film_directors JOIN films ON film_directors.id = films.director_id ORDER BY director_name ASC, film_title DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_films FROM films WHERE director_id = 1
SELECT * FROM films;

SELECT title, director FROM films ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT title FROM films WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan';
SELECT director, COUNT(*) AS movie_count FROM films GROUP BY director;
SELECT * FROM films;
SELECT title, director FROM films WHERE release_date > '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM directors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT title FROM films WHERE director='Christopher Nolan';
SELECT films.title, directors.name FROM films JOIN directors ON films.director_id = directors.director_id;
SELECT * FROM films ORDER BY release_date DESC, title ASC;
SELECT title, director FROM films WHERE director='Christopher Nolan';
SELECT film_id, title FROM films WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT director_name, COUNT(*) FROM directors JOIN film_directors ON directors.director_id = film_directors.director_id GROUP BY director_name;

SELECT * FROM films WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT title, director FROM films WHERE director='Christopher Nolan';
SELECT film_id, title FROM films WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2015-12-31';
SELECT directors.director_name, films.title FROM directors JOIN film_directors ON directors.director_id = film_directors.director_id JOIN films ON films.film_id = film_directors.film_id;
SELECT index_name, index_type FROM indexes WHERE table_name='films';
